text:
[Verse]
City lights they blur
As we're driving fast
Music plays louder
Night won't last

[Verse 2]
Windows down feel free
Wind in our hair
Laughing just you and me
No worries no care

[Chorus]
Midnight drive
Feel so alive
With you by my side
Stars in the sky

[Verse 3]
Street signs flash by
Neon dreams come true
Endless open sky
Just me and you

[Bridge]
No plans just ride
Let the road decide
Follow the moonlight
In the car tonight

[Chorus]
Midnight drive
Feel so alive
With you by my side
Stars in the sky
title: Midnight Drive
